doc.name: PGMReader
doc.description: Read a PGM file and output it as an occupancy grid. Most ROS maps are represented as a portable bitmap therefore this actor is a helper for reading a saved map scan.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.property: The file name or URL from which to read. This is a string with any form accepted by File Attribute.
A mapping between image input and output values to generate a quantized output. Set this parameter to empty array for no quantization. Empty array means no quantization
